Guns.Name: Spread Gun
Guns.Description:
The spread gun rapidly fires 5 energy balls per shot in a broad angle.

Damage: 5 per bullet (max. 25)
Rate of fire: 420 round/min
Lifespan: 0.71s
Speed: 1000
Cost: 2

Guns.Name: Vulcan
Guns.Description:
The Vulcan is a rather quick gun which fires its projectiles in a broad range, it also is very accurate.

Damage: 3 per bullet (max. 21)
Rate of fire: 525 round/min
Lifespan: 0.71s
Speed: 1000
Cost: 5

Guns.Name: Chaser2
Guns.Description:
Chaser2 is a rapidly firing energy rifle which fires fast but weak projectiles which will follow and fly towards the nearest enemy. The projectiles are very effective in chasing their targets.

Damage: 3
Rate of fire: 840 round/min
Lifespan: 0.85s
Speed: 1200
Cost: 2

Guns.Name: Stick Grenade
Guns.Description:
The stick grenade will explode on impact with a player or an object and continously cause massive local damage.

Damage: Local explosion
Rate of fire: 210 round/min
Lifespan: 1.14s
Speed: 340
Cost: 5

You will order a nuclear strike in a fixed distance from your position into your viewing direction or at least to the nearest wall. A siren will go off and a small red dot designates the impact position. About 4.5 seconds later, a nuclear missile will impact and causes a massive explosion, destruction and death.

Damage: Huge explosion, devastating
Rate of fire: 8.4 round/min
Cost: 50
Guns.Name: Nuclear Strike
Booby Trap
Guns.Description:
The booby trap is a weapon which is thrown onto the ground. When on the ground, a visual deception module activates and will make the trap look like a health pack. Any player (including the trapper) in proximity to the fake health pack will trigger the booby trap, which will explode in a ball of hot (and deadly) fire.

Damage: Fire
Rate of fire: 42 round/min
Cost: 6
